Application of the user. The format must: Application of the user. The format must be {environment}:{application id}. Example: sand:42
Are you sure to send another invitation: Are you sure to send another invitation to {{email}}?
Are you sure you want to re-activate thi: Are you sure you want to re-activate this user?
Are you sure you want to revoke invitati: Are you sure you want to revoke invitation to {{email}}?
Are you sure you want to suspend this us: Are you sure you want to suspend this user?
Are you sure your want to reset client s: Are you sure your want to reset client secret for {{client}}?
Choose the role of the users you want to: Choose the role of the users you want to invite
compose_custom_message: <0>Compose a custom message</0> to make your invites more personal.
Create an OAuth client to build user-fac: Create an OAuth client to build user-facing applications that extend IZBERG platform. These applications are granted access to secured user data, once the user logins through authorization flow.
Enter below email list you want to invit: Enter below email list you want to invite as {{profileName}}
If the client is first party, the user w: If the client is first party, the user won't be prompted with a consent page in authorization flow
Learn how to build OAuth apps:: Learn how to build OAuth apps:
Limit the scopes of the token that this: Limit the scopes of the token that this client is allowed to generate
List of allowed redirect uris in authori: List of allowed redirect uris in authorization flow, separated by commas
List of allowed scopes, separated by com: List of allowed scopes, separated by commas. Example: merchant:write, finance:read. You can input `*` to allow all scopes. Find more about IZBERG scopes <2>here</2>
Name: Name
Password must be at least 8 characters l: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
Password must contain at least one numbe: Password must contain at least one number, one uppercase, one lowercase and one special character:
Temporary limitation: customer login thr: Temporary limitation: customer login through authorization flow is currently not supported.
The client has been activated successful: The client has been activated successful ly
The client has been revoked successfully: The client has been revoked successfully
This list shows all users existing in th: This list shows all users existing in the new user management system (Identity). These users are needed to log into this new Merchant Back-Office.
This user has already been invited: This user has already been invited
To know how to implement M2M authorizati: To know how to implement M2M authorization:
Token generated with owner type operator: Token generated with owner type operator allows access to all ressources inside a domain, while token with merchant owner type restricts access to a single merchant
Token validity duration (in seconds), af: Token validity duration (in seconds), after which a new token needs to be requested. Maximum expiration time is 4 hours.
Use M2M Clients to secure Machine-to-Mac: Use M2M Clients to secure Machine-to-Machine (M2M) communications. They are intended to be used in non-interactive apps, like scripts, bots, or other backend services.
User can manage day-to-day operations (l: User can manage day-to-day operations (like manage catalog, orders...), and manage the merchant's users. He can't edit merchant's settings.
User can manage day-to-day operations (like manage catalog, orders...), manage the merchant's users and edit merchant's settings.
User can manage day-to-day operations (like manage catalog, orders...). He can't edit merchant's settings and manage the merchant's users.
User can manage day-to-day operations (like manage merchants, catalog...), manage the merchant's users and edit marketplace's settings.
User can manage day-to-day operations li: User can manage day-to-day operations like manage merchants, catalog... He can't edit Marketplace's settings and manage the operator's users.
You can enter up to maximum 10 emails se: You can enter up to maximum 10 emails separated by comma
You can enter up to maximum 10 emails. O: You can enter up to maximum 10 emails. Other emails will be ignored
You have sent an email to <strong>{{emai: You have sent an email to {{email}} very recently. Please wait at least 5 minutes before sending a new invitation.
